name: Leisure Suit Larry 7: Love for Sail!
name_original: Leisure Suit Larry 7: Love for Sail!
description:
Leisure Suit Larry 7: Love for Sail! is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line. It came out on 01-01-1996. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Leisure Suit Larry 7: Love for Sail! on PC.
Mark Seibert produced the game. It was directed by Al Lowe.
